title: Govt issues draft norms for ALMM on solar cells from April 2026
description: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy has released draft norms for an approved list of models and manufacturers for solar cells, effective from April 2026. This move aims to boost domestic manufacturing and reduce reliance on imports. The deadline for feedback on the guidelines is October 6.
